org.jgentleframework.context
Interface IAbstractServiceManagement

All Known Subinterfaces:
ServiceProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractServiceManagement, ServiceProviderImpl, WebProvider
public interface IAbstractServiceManagement

Provides some methods in order to manage Interceptor and Matcher.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

isRegistered

boolean isRegistered(Matcher<Definition> matcher,
                     java.lang.Object interceptor)
Returns true if given Interceptor is registered, false otherwise.

Parameters:
matcher - the matcher of specified interceptor
interceptor - the interceptor need to be checked.

matcher - the matcher

getCachedMatcherOf

Matcher<Definition> getCachedMatcherOf(Definition def)
Returns the matcher of given Definition which is cached in.

Parameters:
def - the given definition
Returns:
returns a corresponding Matcher if it exists, if not, returns null.

getMatcherOf

java.util.List<Matcher<Definition>> getMatcherOf(java.lang.Object interceptor)
Returns a list containing all matchers according to given registered Interceptor

Parameters:
interceptor - the interceptor
Returns:
returns a list of corresponding Matcher if it exists, if not, returns an empty list.

refreshMatcherCache

void refreshMatcherCache(Definition definition)
Refresh matcher cache, if does not found any corresponding matcher existed in registered interceptor list, this method will automatically remove all current matcher according to given Definition.

Parameters:
definition - the definition

getMatcherCache

java.util.HashMap<Definition,Matcher<Definition>> getMatcherCache()
Gets the matcher cache.

getInterceptorFromMatcher

                               java.util.List<Interceptor> result)
Gets all interceptors bound to the given Matcher

Parameters:
matcher - the given Matcher
result - the List will contains returned result of interceptors.

getInterceptorsFromMatcher

Gets the interceptors from matcher.

Returns:
the interceptors from matcher
